item.description:
Anyone up for Salsa at the Black Rep (Xxodus Cafe) on Wednesday, June 17? See info. from their Web site below.

Black Rep
LATIN JAZZ AND SALSA SERIES presented by Citizens Bank
Celebrating the Afro-Latino Connection
$5 cover | 18+ | Proper Dress Required

8pm-9pm:
Salsa Lessons w/ Sydonee Harris ($8 for lesson & cover)

9pm-1am:
DJ Papo (every week)
Live performances by Master Carlos DeLeon and the UN Band (every 2nd and 4th Wednesdays)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby just before the 8 p.m. lesson starts
item.name: Salsa with Lesson at Black Rep
